text:
Hey Aaron, I’m the product designer on the team that owns the webhook action, we are actually in the middle of rolling out a beta that introduces this exact functionality. If you could give me your portal ID I could ungate you.

I’d be grateful for any feedback you might have.
Hey Jason! That would be fantastic. This is the portalID I am working on right now: 8318686
Hi <@U02EFVAAGCR> - can you please add this feature into this account too `4363791`?
